result.arabic_text: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَهِيَ ظَٰلِمَةٌۚ إِنَّ أَخۡذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٞ شَدِيدٌ
result.translation: 102. Nabii Mucammadow ku Rabbi magaalol maray kaal koroosite yibbixeeh, digaaleeh kah bayse innah, keenik kalah aka magaaloolih maray isi nafsi koroosannut yudlume, digaaleeh ken bayseh Yallal koroositecniih Yallih farmoytit dirabboyseenimih sabbatah, Diggah Nabiyow ku Rabbih xibix digaalál qansaru leeh gibdih.
